figure_2: Inclusion and exclusion process applied to the studyâ€™s participant pool. From an initial 164,728 potential participants, 11,822 individuals were excluded for being below the age of 18 years, and 50,629 participants were excluded due to missing exposure data. Additionally, 5,141 participants with prior skin cancer diagnoses and 30 participants who died before the start of follow-up were excluded, resulting in 97,106 eligible participants for analysis.
